vulnerabilities.details: Older versions are vulnerable to Path Traversal and RCE (CVE-2021-41773).
Older versions have known vulnerabilities related to request smuggling.
Older versions have potential vulnerabilities related to buffer overflows.

jquery.details: jQuery versions up to 3.4.1 are vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS).

bootstrap.details: Bootstrap versions up to 4.3.1 have a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability.
Bootstrap versions up to 5.1.2 have a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Tooltip component.

angular.js.details: All versions of AngularJS are now end-of-life and unsupported. They may contain unpatched security vulnerabilities.
